business.mission: A Christian music camp for teenagers that combines musical education with spiritual growth, held annually in different Estonian cities.

primary: Teenagers (13–18) interested in music and Christian community
secondary: Churches and donors considering supporting the camp
Young adults and music ministry workers in Estonian churches

goals: Inform visitors about the camp — its mission, activities, and annual location
Direct visitors to social media channels (Instagram, YouTube, Facebook)
Build trust and credibility through the camp's history (since 2018, 5+ cities)

pages.purpose: Hero landing — introduce MusicJam, its Christian mission, key activities, and guide visitors to merch, donate, and social links
What is MusicJam — music activities (vocal, instrumental, orchestra, choir, worship band), spiritual focus, small group atmosphere
Timeline of annual camps by city (Tapa 2018–2019, Tapa 2020, Narva 2021, Kohila 2022, Haapsalu 2023)
Donation section with PayPal link and funding context

constraints.tone: warm, faith-centred, welcoming, energetic — speaks to teenagers and their parents equally

brand.existingColors: Deep crimson/raspberry (#B5174A approx), white, green accent

technical: Social media links: Instagram @musicjam_, YouTube musicjamcamp, Facebook musicjamcamp
